businessProfile.name: Via 313 Pizza
businessProfile.address: 1085 E Main St Ste 200, Lehi, UT 84043, USA
businessProfile.formatted_address: 1085 E Main St Ste 200, Lehi, UT 84043, USA

reviews.text: First time dining here.  Fun atmosphere, slobber-worthy food, and spectacular tunes!  Gage was our waiter. He was friendly and informative about Detroit style pizza.  Highly recommend for a night out!

I ordered a slice of deep dish to go and it was fantastic! The tomato sauce had a slight sweet flavor to break up the rich pepperoni and cheese. Absolutely delicious!

I only waited between 5 - 10 minutes after I ordered my food before it was ready.

You can see by the menu. They have a wide selection of food to choose from and cannot wait to try.

The restaurant smelled delicious while I was waiting. Next time I‚Äôm in the area, I‚Äôll definitely be sitting down in the restaurant and ordering a full meal.

Crystal was our server and she made such a memorable experience for my 40th birthday. She was very attentive to my allergy (dairy) and made it a point so I could get an appetizer, an entree, and a dessert completely dairy free.  She was kind and very helpful. She made sure we had everything we needed. She checked in often and Crystal did a fantastic job! Thank you to Crystal and VIA 313 for having dairy free options.

When my friend recommended me the Via313 in Orem, I knew I had to visit the one in Lehi. Boy, were my expectations blown away.

The service was great. The person serving me at the bar was very nice and knew how to serve me while still keeping distance (I was at the bar because I went solo, not because I was drinking). The atmosphere and design was also great.

Don't even get me started on the bread sticks! Those things were crispy on the outside, soft on the inside, and perfect in every way (as you can see, I couldn't help but start eating before taking a picture). They put the right amount of spice to where it tasted a little tangy but also very salty in compliment with the cheese.

Definitely coming back as often as I can!

Food was outstanding ! This is a prime example of getting what you pay for ! We will definitely come again. Crystal was our server and she was fantastic ! Friendly, informative and tentative to our needs !

editorial_summary.overview: Local pizzeria chain known for its square, Detroit-style pizzas & inventive toppings.

recentReviews.text:
The food here is to die for. Everything is so fresh and good portion for the price. I love that everything also has a slight twist to it to make it unique, it really makes it stand out.

Get the ambassador bridge. It's perfect. Lots of other things on the menu are good as well, but that's the best.

The staff here is so friendly and make good recommendations. It's very clean inside and has many different seating options (booths, tables, bar seating, outdoor area).

Cannot recommend this place enough!
Very unique experience.  The Detroit style pizza was very good.  I got the omnivore.  It is pretty lite on the sauce but I like mine even lighter.  Probably my second favorite style.
Fod was really good. Our server, Nate, was amazing. He took really good care of our group of 12

Loved the food! Our server, Caleb, killed it! Made our date night super enjoyable.
Also the cinnamon bread was INCREDIBLE.

This has became one of, if not, our favourite local spot(s)!!!!  The pizza is just amazing!  The crispy, cheesy crust, wrapped around the tastiest pizza with just the perfect amount of sauce, it‚Äôs absolutely mind blowing!!  The other thing I love is the staff!!  We went to eat tonight and the server we had last time remembered us and came up and said hello, then just as we were finishing our pizza and getting ready to order dessert, here came our favourite dessert!  Grace, one of the managers there always remembers us and sent our favourite dessert out before we even had a chance to order it!  It made us feel pretty good!  So if you want amazing pizza, drinks and desserts that will blow your mind, plus staff that treats you and feeds you like family,  is definitely the place to go.
Great food and great service! Parker was our server and he was super friendly and attentive!
Excelente pizzas buen sabor el pan delicioso. Todo muy rico al estilo detroit.

detailedReviews.author: sara jones
detailedReviews.text:
The food here is to die for. Everything is so fresh and good portion for the price. I love that everything also has a slight twist to it to make it unique, it really makes it stand out.

Get the ambassador bridge. It's perfect. Lots of other things on the menu are good as well, but that's the best.

The staff here is so friendly and make good recommendations. It's very clean inside and has many different seating options (booths, tables, bar seating, outdoor area).

Cannot recommend this place enough!

detailedReviews.author: Gina McCurdy
detailedReviews.text: You‚Äôre famous on YouTube üí•

detailedReviews.author: John Woodrum
detailedReviews.text: Very unique experience.  The Detroit style pizza was very good.  I got the omnivore.  It is pretty lite on the sauce but I like mine even lighter.  Probably my second favorite style.

detailedReviews.author: Mark Palmer
detailedReviews.text: Fod was really good. Our server, Nate, was amazing. He took really good care of our group of 12

detailedReviews.author: McKenna Black
detailedReviews.text:
Loved the food! Our server, Caleb, killed it! Made our date night super enjoyable.
Also the cinnamon bread was INCREDIBLE.

detailedReviews.author: Michael McKinnon
detailedReviews.text: This has became one of, if not, our favourite local spot(s)!!!!  The pizza is just amazing!  The crispy, cheesy crust, wrapped around the tastiest pizza with just the perfect amount of sauce, it‚Äôs absolutely mind blowing!!  The other thing I love is the staff!!  We went to eat tonight and the server we had last time remembered us and came up and said hello, then just as we were finishing our pizza and getting ready to order dessert, here came our favourite dessert!  Grace, one of the managers there always remembers us and sent our favourite dessert out before we even had a chance to order it!  It made us feel pretty good!  So if you want amazing pizza, drinks and desserts that will blow your mind, plus staff that treats you and feeds you like family,  is definitely the place to go.

detailedReviews.author: Rebecca Jones
detailedReviews.text: Great food and great service! Parker was our server and he was super friendly and attentive!

detailedReviews.author: jhossemar sivira diaz
detailedReviews.text: Excelente pizzas buen sabor el pan delicioso. Todo muy rico al estilo detroit.

detailedReviews.author: Eric Lanier
detailedReviews.text: Food was outstanding ! This is a prime example of getting what you pay for ! We will definitely come again. Crystal was our server and she was fantastic ! Friendly, informative and tentative to our needs !

detailedReviews.author: Jordan Perez
detailedReviews.text: It was amazing ty

detailedReviews.author: Jarrod Wilbur
detailedReviews.text: Mind blowingly good. The gluten free is the best gluten free food I‚Äôve ever had. Jayden was an incredible server!

detailedReviews.author: Brittney Oliver
detailedReviews.text: First time dining here.  Fun atmosphere, slobber-worthy food, and spectacular tunes!  Gage was our waiter. He was friendly and informative about Detroit style pizza.  Highly recommend for a night out!

detailedReviews.author: Ryan Miner
detailedReviews.text: Normally I am not one to leave reviews, but this place is amazing! The Detroit-style pizzas are delicious! Caleb M, our server, did a fantastic job and was very attentive during our meal. There was a slight miscommunication when we arrived, but he went above and beyond to make up for it. Definitely will be coming back

detailedReviews.author: shane young
detailedReviews.text: Server Grace was perfect!

detailedReviews.author: Crystal Warren
detailedReviews.text:
I had heard about Via313 Pizza from a lady that had come into my boutique in Southern Utah.  I am so glad she told me about it, because it was DELICIOUS!!

Not only was the food good, but Bob, I believe he was the manager was exceptional!  The gluten free pizza and cheese sticks had the texture and taste of regular gluten pizza.

Do not sleep on this place!  Also, try The Cadillac Detroit Style pizza it was amazing.

detailedReviews.author: Lorrie Doyle
detailedReviews.text: Pizza was yummy.  Good sized salad on lunch deal!

detailedReviews.author: Gabraylie Green
detailedReviews.text: TONS of gluten free options and DF too!

detailedReviews.author: Christian Clements
detailedReviews.text: Wasn't very impressed with the food or the price, probably won't revisit this place unless every other food chain closes.

detailedReviews.author: Stephen Williams
detailedReviews.text: Via 313 has great deep dish, Detroit-style pizza. My absolute favorite option is "The Cadillac", mostly because they can sometimes put on a little too much sauce and the Cadillac doesn't have tomato sauce on it. That being said, I have also enjoyed the other options I've gotten here a lot. They also have a great root beer option that comes in a frosted mug (our server told us we could get a free refill of another soda after it was gone, not sure if that's standard). Biggest downside for me is that the service can be a bit slow, especially with a group (I usually go with about 10 people in the group and it takes about an hour to get our food even though it's relatively empty during lunch time). The price is also a bit high for my tastes.

detailedReviews.author: Brooks W Hansen
detailedReviews.text: Tyler takes great care of us!!!

detailedReviews.author: Kimberlee Martinez
detailedReviews.text: Excellent food, great service. The cheese sticks were delicious, salad was fresh. Our server Caleb was friendly, and prompt. Will be coming back again. Would recommend this place.

detailedReviews.author: Scott Olmsted
detailedReviews.text: Not only was the pizza some of the zestiest explosions of flavor that has me hooked, Tyler, our server was someone I would encounter at a 5 star steak house. This place impressed me.

detailedReviews.author: Caitlyn Hightower
detailedReviews.text: Parker was our waiter and was so good. He was so kind and happy. You could tell he loved his job! He also did so well with keeping our table happy and hydrated. Request Parker if you go!

detailedReviews.author: Steve Hansen
detailedReviews.text: The pizza was great!

detailedReviews.author: Catelyn Gentry
detailedReviews.text: Always enjoy eating here. Wonderful food, clean, great atmosphere and the best employees

detailedReviews.author: Kamryn Jones
detailedReviews.text: For my first experience at Via313 I am incredibly pleased. From the moment we walked in we were welcomed with kindness and urgency. My husband asked if we could have a kids menu and crayons as a joke, and without hesitation they printed us two, to color. The environment is awesome, the food is SO good, and there is a lot of choose from, including drinks. Our waiter, Parker, was an absolutely gem. He was attentive, respectful, and very outgoing. He made the experience for us! I suggest you come to this place, if not for the experience but for the food as well. Come on Mondays, Fridays and Saturdays if you want to be served by Parker. ;) If his boss sees this, give him a raise!

detailedReviews.author: Marissa Swearingen
detailedReviews.text: We had a wonderful experience at Via 313.  The food was so good, the atmosphere was great, and our server, Madison, was FANTASTIC! It was our first time and Madison explained the menu to us, gave suggestions, catered to our kids, and even treated us to dessert. Such a great experience!! Highly recommend.

detailedReviews.author: Brett Dieckmann
detailedReviews.text:
I love the food, but 2 of my last 3 experiences here have been horrible. I had placed a carry out order and sat in their carry out room for about 20 minutes while at least two employees walked past me without acknowledging me, despite me try to ask them for help.

Then tonight we ordered for delivery. My order was supposed to be delivered at 6:33. By 653 after not hearing from the restaurant at all, I called. Got put on hold right away. Then I'm told "Oh your dasher just got here." It should be there soon. No where on their website does it say they deliver via doordash. I've never had a good experience with doordash. And had I known they used them for delivery. I never would have ordered delivery. Now my pizza will arrive about 45 minutes after it should have. $80 worth of soggy pizza and cheese bread. Yay.

I guess you can only eat in person at this location for a good experience.

5 stars for food. 1 star for service. Poor service outweighs quality food.

detailedReviews.author: Brent Morley
detailedReviews.text: It‚Äôs a pizza place. Thin crust bar-style pepperoni was great. The Chicago style square with the sauce spooned in heaps on top of the rest of the ingredients after the fact, is going to depend on your personal pizza preferences.

detailedReviews.author: Carlie Jo Wiley-Wolter
detailedReviews.text: The Detroit style is off the chain! Our server, Crystal was amazing!

detailedReviews.author: Weston Wilson
detailedReviews.text: I have never had better service anywhere. Bob and other servers have been so kind and helpful. 10/10 service and 10/10 food!

detailedReviews.author: Logan Parker
detailedReviews.text: My favorite place to eat! Crystal was the best waitress. Everyone needs to eat here, especially for a birthday.

detailedReviews.author: Chelsea Hayes
detailedReviews.text:
My husband and I went here while on a trip, and had a very good experience. The restaurant was clean and well decorated. The food was very tasty We ordered a Detroit style Hawaiian pizza and a rocky road hubcap dessert.

Our server, Parker, was exceptional - polite, respectful, and enthusiastic with recommendations when we asked. After he served us he didn‚Äôt disappear, but checked in on us throughout our meal. Completely unprompted, he asked if I liked the flavored lemonade because he noticed I wasn‚Äôt drinking it. I admitted that I liked it but that it was a little too strong for me. He made me a new more mild one so it would be more to my taste. I don‚Äôt think he treated us any differently than he treats all of his customers, I think he regularly goes above and beyond. If I could give 10/5 stars for service I would. If we‚Äôre ever in the area again, we‚Äôll be back.

detailedReviews.author: E
detailedReviews.text:
This place is amazing. I have really never seen such attentive servers. The food is really great and you will be planning your return visit before you even leave.
I have seen this establishment before and wondered how it was. I'm so glad we went in.
We celebrated 2 birthdays for family there within a months time.

detailedReviews.author: Marc Walker
detailedReviews.text: We ordered 5 pizza's for take out and 2 were special order. One of the special orders was incorrect but it was our fault. The manager, Mariah, asked how they could make it right, did I mention it was our fault? Nobody does that. Way to go Lehi Via 313, and the awesome manager Mariah!

detailedReviews.author: Karine Clark
detailedReviews.text: We love via 313. Probably my favorite pizza in Utah.  Always hot. We usually get it to go so I can't say much about the table service. They are always friendly when I pick up my pizza. You can call and order instead of doing it through their website which charges a fee. They don't charge if you call to order.

detailedReviews.author: Ca Ba
detailedReviews.text: My wife and I have lived here for 4 years and always wanted to try this place out. Today was the day and boy did we make the right choice. Nate did phenominal from the moment we walked in. He took the time to explain fan favorites and styles. 5/5 food, 5/5 service 5/5 atmosphere. We will definitely be back.

detailedReviews.author: Skyler Trujillo
detailedReviews.text:
I ordered a slice of deep dish to go and it was fantastic! The tomato sauce had a slight sweet flavor to break up the rich pepperoni and cheese. Absolutely delicious!

I only waited between 5 - 10 minutes after I ordered my food before it was ready.

You can see by the menu. They have a wide selection of food to choose from and cannot wait to try.

The restaurant smelled delicious while I was waiting. Next time I‚Äôm in the area, I‚Äôll definitely be sitting down in the restaurant and ordering a full meal.

detailedReviews.author: Anandi Wilkinson
detailedReviews.text: Crystal was our server and she made such a memorable experience for my 40th birthday. She was very attentive to my allergy (dairy) and made it a point so I could get an appetizer, an entree, and a dessert completely dairy free.  She was kind and very helpful. She made sure we had everything we needed. She checked in often and Crystal did a fantastic job! Thank you to Crystal and VIA 313 for having dairy free options.

detailedReviews.author: Pamela Sueldo
detailedReviews.text: Crystal in the Lehi Utah location was amazing! We were celebrating my friends bday and she is dairy free. We didn't know the cinnamon sticks could be dairy free. She brought one for her bday and made her day. Thank you!

detailedReviews.author: Adam Skaggs
detailedReviews.text:
A host tipped themself. Unacceptable.

I've ordered here a few times but on a recent occasion the screen was flipped away from me before I had the chance to tip or not to tip. I noted to check the bank statement and yeah it was higher than it was supposed to be. Only a few bucks but that's stealing.

detailedReviews.author: Alyssa Julian
detailedReviews.text: This place is SO GOOD. Family friendly and Parker was an amazing server! Thank you for going above and beyond and making sure we had everything we needed!

detailedReviews.author: Bryan Lazo
detailedReviews.text:
When my friend recommended me the Via313 in Orem, I knew I had to visit the one in Lehi. Boy, were my expectations blown away.

The service was great. The person serving me at the bar was very nice and knew how to serve me while still keeping distance (I was at the bar because I went solo, not because I was drinking). The atmosphere and design was also great.

Don't even get me started on the bread sticks! Those things were crispy on the outside, soft on the inside, and perfect in every way (as you can see, I couldn't help but start eating before taking a picture). They put the right amount of spice to where it tasted a little tangy but also very salty in compliment with the cheese.

Definitely coming back as often as I can!

detailedReviews.author: BP Nelson
detailedReviews.text: It is the best pizza place I‚Äôve ever been to

detailedReviews.author: Tyler Young
detailedReviews.text: Genuinely the best pizza I‚Äôve ever had in my life! Nate was our server and he killed it with great recommendations and accommodations for Celiac disease. I‚Äôm so satisfied and stuffed. I will be returning!

detailedReviews.author: Suzanne and Frank Wright
detailedReviews.text: Parker was a great server!

detailedReviews.author: Jaquelyn Carter
detailedReviews.text: We loved crystal! She was wonderful

detailedReviews.author: Bryan Larsen
detailedReviews.text: I‚Äôve been here a few times and the pizza has been incredible every time. Head in and eat at the restaurant for some amazing drinks as well.

detailedReviews.author: Madis World
detailedReviews.text: Food was amazing and Tyler did an amazing job!

detailedReviews.author: Dallin Dye
detailedReviews.text: Amazing Pizza, do yourself a favor and ask for Tyler as your server, and get the Jalape√±o Poppa. You won‚Äôt regret either, they‚Äôre the best!

detailedReviews.author: Julie Olson
detailedReviews.text: Great gluten free pizza!!!!

detailedReviews.author: Dan Hooker
detailedReviews.text: Awesome gluten free pizza crust! My only complaint is their sauce is a little bland. We'll be back!

detailedReviews.author: Scott Andersen
detailedReviews.text: Lots of unique Detroit style pizza

detailedReviews.author: Andrea Ricks
detailedReviews.text: It was our first time here. The pizza was so good! I had a gluten free pizza and the crust was amazing. Tyler gave great recommendations. Already planning to eat here the next time we are in town from California.

detailedReviews.author: Karen Cook
detailedReviews.text: Sooo good! Food was delicious and our server Tyler was awesome!

detailedReviews.author: Adam Heaton
detailedReviews.text: Amazing pizza. Definitely coming back

detailedReviews.author: Elizabeth Cluff
detailedReviews.text: We expected to have some good pizza, but didn‚Äôt expect how fun (and how delicious) the whole experience would be! Everyone was so kind. At one point, I even joked that it felt like the staff were my friends. The food was crazy good. Very reasonably priced. I also have never seen a cheese pull like we were able to manage! We got the Boston Cooler which was fantastic. Jayden was our server and he was excellent‚Äî had great recommendations and joked with us. The manager, though we didn‚Äôt catch her name, was great too. We‚Äôll be back!

detailedReviews.author: Megan Duffin
detailedReviews.text: Amazing good as always. We love this location and Tyler our server was wonderful!

detailedReviews.author: Burton Holmes
detailedReviews.text: Oh! My! Goodness! I really like pizza. I have celiac. And that was the best pizza I‚Äôve had in a long while. The gf crust was amazing. Super light and crunchy edges while soft inside. The toppings of course, we fantastic. My sister and I are gf. The rest of the party (12 people) had a great experience too.

detailedReviews.author: Austin
detailedReviews.text: Best gluten free pizza you can get. Honestly we don‚Äôt know how they make the dough.

detailedReviews.author: Spencer 801
detailedReviews.text:
First time to Via313. For deep dish pizza it was really good. I would highly recommend the "Jalapeno Poppa" Service, was Excellent! Gage, was great, super funny and fun to chat with!

I'm definitely coming back!

detailedReviews.author: Kassi Sage
detailedReviews.text: Such good food! The cheese bread was amazing! We ordered the Jalapeno poppa Detroit style! It was so yummy! Highly recommend!

detailedReviews.author: Tanen Bodell
detailedReviews.text: Gage is the best!!!! Food is amazing! He will take care of you like a great waiter does.

detailedReviews.author: Connor Thomas
detailedReviews.text: This is one of our favorite spots! Bob is the best and always treats us right! Can't miss!

detailedReviews.author: Rachel Bell
detailedReviews.text: The BEST!!!! We absolutely love this place. The pizza is amazing and they use great quality ingredients. Their gluten free options are genuinely delicious. We are always treated so well here, especially by Bob and Moriah, they're the best!

detailedReviews.author: Shirley Britsch
detailedReviews.text: Absolutely wonderful tasty pizza!  Great service and friendly waitress. The manager even gave us treats!!

detailedReviews.author: Rachel Routt
detailedReviews.text: I love Via 313 and chose to eat here for my birthday. Food was amazing as always and the service was top tier. We were a larger group and we felt so taken care of. Sometimes larger groups of people can be hard to take care of and it can be stressful for the diners and the staff but that is not the case with Via. They made us feel so welcome and truly went above and beyond. If you are looking for delicious pizza, great service, and a nice atmosphere, don‚Äôt skip this place. Highly recommend. Major shoutout to Crystal in Lehi, you made our night!

detailedReviews.author: Ella Hansen
detailedReviews.text: SO fantastic!! The server was AMAZING! I ordered a gluten free pizza and dessert and it was SO. good. I will say, it took a while to get our food, but SO worth it üôåüèº

detailedReviews.author: Jeremy Williams
detailedReviews.text: Really good pizza. Ask for Jaden he‚Äôs one of the greatest servers I‚Äôve ever had!y

detailedReviews.author: Brenda Dominguez
detailedReviews.text: Maddie was the best, we were passing through on the way home to Las Vegas. I have a gluten allergy and the gluten free pizza, breadsticks and cinnamon sticks were all AMAZING. Thank you so much Maddie for hooking it up ‚ù§Ô∏è

detailedReviews.author: Bear Wilson
detailedReviews.text: Nate was an absolute rockstar who provided phenomenal service and made my birthday lunch so special!

detailedReviews.author: Sati Sivongsa
detailedReviews.text: Waitress didn't mind us. Looks liked we didnt even exist like the table of dudes, guess working for those tips.

detailedReviews.author: Matthew Ivie
detailedReviews.text: This place is so good holy cow, I thought it would be his, but it's insanely good pizza. Will definitely come again!

detailedReviews.author: Sierra Kuhn
detailedReviews.text: This was our first time at via 313, it was so yummy and the service was amazing at the Lehi location!

detailedReviews.author: Mary Wilson
detailedReviews.text: Such a great experience. Our server was so kind and the food was so yummy. We went for my sister‚Äôs birthday and they surprised us with a sweet style pizza!

detailedReviews.author: Victoria Lovinggood
detailedReviews.text: Gluten free and eggs free pizza are fantastic for my husband who has allergies and they are very careful with the process. The atmosphere is relaxed and fun at the same time, but I wish they didn't push agendas on you and when they've messed up it's hit or miss if you'll be compensated or not. Mixed Drinks here are great and I love their regular Detroit style pizzas. All in all a decent place to eat and hangout out.

detailedReviews.author: Mike Ashcraft
detailedReviews.text: Pretty pricey, but seems everything is now.  I got the meatballs and the grilled broccoli & cauliflower appetizers.  The broccoli & cauliflower were ok.  The broccoli was a little under done and the cauliflower was a little over done.  The meatballs were good, the red sauce on them was delicious.  Service was good.  Place is clean.

detailedReviews.author: Trevor W
detailedReviews.text: Don't waste your time. Soggy pizza and leathery cheese. I called in for an order to be ready in 3 hours and got a notification that it was ready 20 minutes later. So I called and they said they'd remake it. Well, they didn't and my dad got 2 disappointing soggy pizzas for his birthday. Oh and it was $80. They thought I wouldn't know the difference between a fresh pizza and one that's hours old. Well I can tell. See the pic for yourself, the ricotta is never melted all over the place on a fresh pizza. I'm disappointed by VIA 313 far too often for how expensive it is.

detailedReviews.author: Terri
detailedReviews.text: Via 313 doesn‚Äôt disappoint. Their new Detroit style buffalo chicken pizza was great and I always love the classic cheese. Wish they had salad bowls I/o plates.

detailedReviews.author: Charlie Cavallaro
detailedReviews.text: Great place for any occasion

detailedReviews.author: Paige McCabe
detailedReviews.text: Amazing food and service!

detailedReviews.author: weston tervort
detailedReviews.text: Awsome

detailedReviews.author: Chris Biddulph
detailedReviews.text: We really enjoy this place. The pizza tastes amazing, the staff is amazing, and the environment is great.

detailedReviews.author: Lexis Cooper
detailedReviews.text: Pizza is very good. A little overpriced in my opinion. Our pizza also took half an hour to come out when there was basically nobody there.

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers are genuinely thrilled with their experience. With an average 4.7/5 rating across 100 recent reviews, your restaurant consistently exceeds expectations.

strengthsPerceived: The Detroit-style pizzas are consistently praised for their delicious taste and unique crispy, cheesy crust with the perfect amount of sauce. - social media marketing can showcase this strength

The staff, including servers like Nate, Caleb, and Grace, are frequently highlighted for their friendliness, attentiveness, and exceptional service, making customers feel like family. - review management can highlight this positive aspect

The restaurant offers a wide range of gluten-free options that are highly praised for their taste and texture, comparable to regular gluten pizzas. - SEO services can leverage this for better visibility
improvementOpportunities: Long wait times for food and service, especially for larger groups - Boostly marketing services can improve this
Negative reviews and poor service experiences, including delivery issues and unacknowledged carry-out customers - review management can address this concern
Lack of transparency and issues with tipping practices - social media marketing can improve this area

positive.author: sara jones
positive.text:
The food here is to die for. Everything is so fresh and good portion for the price. I love that everything also has a slight twist to it to make it unique, it really makes it stand out.

Get the ambassador bridge. It's perfect. Lots of other things on the menu are good as well, but that's the best.

The staff here is so friendly and make good recommendations. It's very clean inside and has many different seating options (booths, tables, bar seating, outdoor area).

Cannot recommend this place enough!

negative.author: Christian Clements
negative.text: Wasn't very impressed with the food or the price, probably won't revisit this place unless every other food chain closes.

negative.author: Brett Dieckmann
negative.text:
I love the food, but 2 of my last 3 experiences here have been horrible. I had placed a carry out order and sat in their carry out room for about 20 minutes while at least two employees walked past me without acknowledging me, despite me try to ask them for help.

Then tonight we ordered for delivery. My order was supposed to be delivered at 6:33. By 653 after not hearing from the restaurant at all, I called. Got put on hold right away. Then I'm told "Oh your dasher just got here." It should be there soon. No where on their website does it say they deliver via doordash. I've never had a good experience with doordash. And had I known they used them for delivery. I never would have ordered delivery. Now my pizza will arrive about 45 minutes after it should have. $80 worth of soggy pizza and cheese bread. Yay.

I guess you can only eat in person at this location for a good experience.

5 stars for food. 1 star for service. Poor service outweighs quality food.

negative.author: Adam Skaggs
negative.text:
A host tipped themself. Unacceptable.

I've ordered here a few times but on a recent occasion the screen was flipped away from me before I had the chance to tip or not to tip. I noted to check the bank statement and yeah it was higher than it was supposed to be. Only a few bucks but that's stealing.

recommendations.title: Generate More Reviews
recommendations.description: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews
